post.body: you can ask me about Egypt anytime!
Good luck with your interview! I am sure that everything will be ok :)
that was a great class! You are really a talented TOEFL tutor!
So sorry to hear about that but you should take care of yourself. I hope you feel better soon.
No need to envy me! The vacation did not change anything I think! I hope I can start my studies!
Thank you! I hope this week will be better!
Oh help me! I have hypo-edufiremia. http://tinyurl.com/6d3tww
I don't recommend it either., although vodaphone and Mobinil are not much better.
Wanna visit Egypt tomorrow for free http://edufire.com/forums/1/topics/1276
You can take Egyptian and visit Egypt at the same time. http://tinyurl.com/6h89l6
Good morning! Hope you have a good day!
edited my video 4 tutoring Arabic at the citadel in Cairo, Yippee! tell me ur opinion http://tinyurl.com/6nqq88
Back to work! Classes classes classes! I am tired but I should start working anyway :)
Egyptian word everyday? http://tinyurl.com/5zswau
Wow, now everyone can learn Egyptian dialect for holiday with a special price! http://tinyurl.com/6nqq88
Going on vacation for 2 day:) hopefully will get my laptop on Wednesday!
had bad luck yesterday! it was not going well at all :(

Wow, last session was GREAT ! 10 students attended :) & they could speak Egyptian with each other. Hopefully 2night will b better.
